entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
